label: Administrative Officer
xx_scope: Responsible for Office Administration and administrative support

label: Head of Agency or Office
xx_scope: Head of a UN, NGO or local agency or office.  May include managing staff working in the country office; including assisting in the preparation of office work and cost plans and financial, human resources and administrative management.

label: Civil-Military Officer
xx_scope:
Facilitates dialogue
and interaction between civilian
and military actors to better deliver humanitarian relief during a natural disaster or complex emergency.

label: Cluster Co-Lead
xx_scope: Works in collaboration with the Cluster Coordinator in leading cluster-based activities during humanitarian operations.  Frequently co-chairs cluster coordination meetings and other activities.

label: Cluster Coordinator
xx_scope: Responsible for leading cluster-based activities during humanitarian operations.  Provides leadership and works on behalf of the cluster as a whole, facilitating all cluster activities and developing and maintaining a strategic vision and operational response plan.

label: Public Information Officer
xx_label_fr: Spécialiste en communication et relations publiques
xx_scope: Delivers core messages related to a humanitarian response using various communication tools, including social media tools, radio, television, print, the internet, videoconferencing and other new information technologies.

label: GenCap Officer
xx_scope: Inter-agency staff trained to advise on, facilitate and strengthen capacity and leadership of humanitarians to undertake and promote gender-sensitive programming to ensure the distinct needs of women, girls, boys and men of all ages and backgrounds, are taken into account in humanitarian action at global, regional, and country levels.  Frequently deploy to be hosted by the Humanitarian Coordinator's Office or a UN agency.

label: Government Official
xx_scope: An official who is involved in public administration or government, through either election, appointment, selection, or employment.

label: HCT Member
xx_label_es: Miembro del Equipo Humanitario de un País
xx_scope:
Composed of members of organisations that are undertaking humanitarian action in-country and
that have committed to participate in coordination arrangements. These may include UN agencies, the International Organization for Migration, non-governmental organizations, and subject to
their individual mandates, components of the International Red Cross and Red Crescent
Movement.

label: Information Management Officer
xx_label_fr: Spécialiste de la gestion de l’information
xx_scope: Manage information and data around the humanitarian programme cycle, including supporting common information processes such as preparedness, needs assessment, strategic planning, resource mobilization, implementation and monitoring.

label: ProCap Officer
xx_scope: Inter-agency staff  trained to advise on and support the strategic and operational humanitarian protection response for Displaced Persons and other vulnerable populations.

label: Donor
xx_scope: Organization's representative responsible for donating money, goods or other in-kind contributions.

label: Humanitarian Coordinator
xx_scope: Senior-most United Nations official in a country experiencing a humanitarian emergency. The Humanitarian Coordinator is appointed by the United Nations Emergency Relief Coordinator when a new emergency occurs or an existing humanitarian situation worsens in degree and/or complexity.

label: Military Officer
xx_scope: Member of an armed force or uniformed service who holds a position of authority.

label: United Nations Country Team Member
xx_scope: Representatives of the UN funds and programmes, specialized agencies and other UN entities accredited to a given country designated to participate in the United Nations Country Team.

label: Resident Coordinator
xx_scope: Designated representative of the UN Secretary-General assigned to lead the United Nations Country Team.

label: Head of Sub-Office
xx_scope: Manages all staff working in the field sub-office; including assisting in the preparation of office work and cost plans and financial, human resources and administrative management.

label: Executive Assistant
xx_scope: Assists senior management (potentially including the management of human and financial resources, ethics, investigation and audit, and management and analysis).

label: UNDAC Member
xx_scope: Individuals specifially trained as members of the United Nations Disaster Assessment and Coordination team in order to  deploy to disaster-affected locations upon the request of the United Nations Resident or Humanitarian Coordinator and/or the affected Government.

label: Cluster Coordination Team Member
xx_scope: Cluster member who seeks to strategize and coordinate humanitarian activities between clusters.

label: Environmental Expert
xx_scope: Expert whose role is to provide information and guidance on environmental topics, including natural resource use, waste management, chemical pollution and energy provision.
